mapper.update: update t_sku_category_relation set category_code = #{categoryCode}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, update_time = now(), show_order = #{showOrder} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,category_code,sku_code,show_order,create_time,update_time,create_id,update_id from t_sku_category_relation where sku_code = #{skuCode} order by show_order desc

select count(a.id) from t_sku_category_relation as a inner join t_sku as b on a.sku_code = b.code inner join t_sku_inventory c on b.code = c.sku_code where a.category_code = #{categoryCode} and b.status = '2' and c.available_qty > 0
select category_code from t_sku_category_relation where sku_code in('${skuCodes}')
